printliminatorDescription.message: Uma ferramenta simples para tornar a impressão de sites melhor

commandButtons.description: Command buttons: undo, stylize, remove graphics & print

clickToRemove.message: Apenas clique em algo na página para removê-la

altClickRemove.description: Alt-click highlight to remove everything expect the item

removeGraphics.description: Removes all images, iframes and video from the page

viewKeyboardCommands.description: Open a list of keyboard commands

keyUpArrow.description: Up arrow key text added to title

upDescription.message: Encontrar o elemento que envolve a caixa destacada
upDescription.description: Find parent element of current highlight

keyDownArrow.description: Down arrow key text added to title

downDescription.message: Encontrar o conteúdo da caixa destacada
downDescription.description: Find first visible child element of highlight

keyRightArrow.description: Right arrow text added to title

rightDescription.message: Encontrar o próximo elemento no mesmo container
rightDescription.description: Find next visible sibling element of highlight

keyLeftArrow.description: Left arrow text added to title

leftDescription.message: Encontrar o elemento anterior no mesmo container

keyBackspace.description: Press backspace to undo last action

fontUp.message: Aumenta o tamanho da fonte em 1
fontUp.description: Use keyNumpad+ to increase font size

fontDown.message: Diminui o tamanho da fonte em 1
fontDown.description: Use keyNumpad- to decrease font size

mouseLeftClick.message: Clique com o botão esquerdo do mouse

removeOpposite.message: Remover tudo menos a caixa selecionada

fullWidth.message: Muda a largura da caixa para 100% & margem para zero (destaque se torna azul)
fullWidth.description: Make highlighted element full width & add blue outline

keyF1Title.description: F1 key used to toggle messages

toggleMessages.description: Action message display is toggled by the F1 key

keyPSTitle.description: Print Screen key full name added to title

abort.message: Desabilita Printliminator, mas salva o histórico
abort.description: Disable Printliminator, but save undo history.
